About Me

üìçSeoul, South Korea

üìß jiwon24.lee@gmail.com

jiwon.lee@yonsei.ac.kr

1111111111I completed my Ph.D. at Yonsei University under the supervision of Professor Won Woo Ro, with a dissertation titled 'High-Performance Address Translation Mechanisms for Graphics Processing Units.' My research interests span a broad range of topics within computer architecture and systems, including (but not limited to) designing efficient CPU and GPU microarchitectures, virtual memory frameworks, and scalable memory management methods. I am open to postdoctoral opportunities, particularly those that offer the chance to broaden my research expertise beyond my previous focus.

Professional Experience

Staff Engineer Aug. 2024 – Present

Yonsei University, Seoul, South Korea

Advisor: Prof. Won Woo Ro
